description: When a program is not fast enough, we call on the profiler to save us.But what happens when the program is hard to profile, like for instance the Python Debugger? In this talk we're going dive deep into Vmprof, a Python profiler, and see how it helps us find out why a debugger can be slow. Once we find the culprit, we'll use Cython to optimise things.
title: Profiling the Unprofilable
